ComicInfo.Summary:
Jeff Lemire! Multiple worlds collide in this final issue of the hit Black Hammer superhero saga where villains and heroes unite to stop the multiverse from unraveling.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-01 11:20:13. [CVDB925043]
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/black-hammer-reborn-12/4000-925043/
